title: ZygorGuides 4.0.7779
description:
Version: 4.0.7779Released on: January 9th, 2014

Horde Leveling
Eastern Plaguelands:
Divided one large step into smaller steps to provide more clear instructions
Added additional tips
Corrected Light's Hope Chapel flight path, which was previously displaying the Alliance flight master
Added additional waypoints for improved navigation between quests

Ghostlands:
Added additional tips
Corrected npc waypoint
Added additional waypoints for improved navigation between quests
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Corrected quest waypoint
Corrected guide step that wasn't completing
Corrected guide step that had quest objectives reversed

Hillsbrad Foothills:
Removed a confusing guide step, combining it with the following step
Added additional tips
Moved quest waypoint to a better spawn
Corrected guide step that was displaying the wrong quest objectives

Both Achievements
Fixed an error causing the Riches of Pandaria achievement to skip non-complete steps

Alliance Professions
Tailoring:
Increased the amount of Frostweave Cloth required to gather.
Increased the amount of Bolts of Windwool our guide has you create.
Drastically decreased the amount of Spirit of Harmony required to level the profession with.
